Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.accounting

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.stocks.accounting.Transaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Transaction>

    public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Transaction>
    Order to buy or sell an individual stock. This object is also used to record cash transfers in and out of the account;
    Author:
    pschatzmann
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
